languages.text: "Берем планету в собственную осаду — захватите вокс-частоты и транслируйте простую правду: каторжане сражаются за едва пригодный для жизни камень — без имперских властей их ждет смерть. Подкрепляйте истину цитатами из Лекс Империалис о том, что любое сопротивление многократно увеличивает провинность".

"We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."
languages.original_text: "Берем планету в собственную осаду — захватите вокс-частоты и транслируйте простую правду: каторжане сражаются за едва пригодный для жизни камень — без имперских властей их ждет смерть. Подкрепляйте истину цитатами из Лекс Империалис о том, что любое сопротивление многократно увеличивает провинность".

traits.locale_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet. Seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and without the Imperium authorities, they are going to die. Drive the message home with quotes from the Lex Imperialis that say any resistance greatly aggravates the transgression."

"We lay our own siege to the planet. Seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and without the Imperium authorities, they are going to die. Drive the message home with quotes from the Lex Imperialis that say any resistance greatly aggravates the transgression."

"We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

"We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

languages.text: "Wir werden den Planeten selbst belagern und über seine Vox-Frequenzen die Wahrheit verkünden: Dass die Sträflinge um einen kaum bewohnbaren Felsen kämpfen und ohne Aufsicht durch imperiale Behörden sterben werden. Wir werden unsere Botschaft mit Zitaten aus dem Lex Imperia füttern und erklären, dass jeglicher Widerstand das Strafmaß nur erhöht."
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden den Planeten selbst belagern und über seine Vox-Frequenzen die Wahrheit verkünden: Dass die Sträflinge um einen kaum bewohnbaren Felsen kämpfen und ohne Aufsicht durch imperiale Behörden sterben werden. Wir werden unsere Botschaft mit Zitaten aus dem Lex Imperia füttern und erklären, dass jeglicher Widerstand das Strafmaß nur erhöht."

languages.text: "Gezegeni kendimiz kuşatırız, sonra voks frekanslarını ele geçirip yalın gerçeği yayınlarız: Mahkûmlar zar zor yaşanabilir bir kaya parçası için savaşıyorlar ve İmparatorluk yetkilileri olmadan ölecekler. Lex İmperialis'ten alıntılarla mesajı iyice benimsetiriz ve her türlü direnişin suçu sadece ağırlaştıracağını ilan ederiz."
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegeni kendimiz kuşatırız, sonra voks frekanslarını ele geçirip yalın gerçeği yayınlarız: Mahkûmlar zar zor yaşanabilir bir kaya parçası için savaşıyorlar ve İmparatorluk yetkilileri olmadan ölecekler. Lex İmperialis'ten alıntılarla mesajı iyice benimsetiriz ve her türlü direnişin suçu sadece ağırlaştıracağını ilan ederiz."

languages.text: «Primero asediamos el planeta, luego interferimos sus frecuencias de voco y las usamos para transmitir la pura verdad: que los reclusos luchan por una roca inhóspita y que, sin las autoridades del Imperium a su cargo, morirán irremisiblemente. Reforzaremos el mensaje con citas de la Lex Imperialis, declarando que toda resistencia no hará sino agravar su transgresión».
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: «Primero asediamos el planeta, luego interferimos sus frecuencias de voco y las usamos para transmitir la pura verdad: que los reclusos luchan por una roca inhóspita y que, sin las autoridades del Imperium a su cargo, morirán irremisiblemente. Reforzaremos el mensaje con citas de la Lex Imperialis, declarando que toda resistencia no hará sino agravar su transgresión».

languages.text: “我们可以将敌人包围起来，侵入他们的音阵通讯频道，让所有敌人都了解这个事实——他们争夺的这颗行星不过是片死气沉沉的岩地，根本不适合人类居住，这里的人一旦失去了帝国当局管制，便只有死路一条。我们可以引用《帝国法典》的条款，让他们意识到负隅顽抗只会加重他们的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以将敌人包围起来，侵入他们的音阵通讯频道，让所有敌人都了解这个事实——他们争夺的这颗行星不过是片死气沉沉的岩地，根本不适合人类居住，这里的人一旦失去了帝国当局管制，便只有死路一条。我们可以引用《帝国法典》的条款，让他们意识到负隅顽抗只会加重他们的罪行。”

languages.text: « Assiégeons notre propre planète, puis monopolisons les fréquences-vox en martelant la vérité : les détenus luttent pour s'emparer d'un caillou à peine habitable et sans le soutien de l'Imperium, ils mourront l'un après l'autre. Nous ponctuerons nos déclarations de citations issues de la Lex Imperialis et rappellerons que toute tentative de résistance ne fera qu'aggraver leur transgression. »
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: « Assiégeons notre propre planète, puis monopolisons les fréquences-vox en martelant la vérité : les détenus luttent pour s'emparer d'un caillou à peine habitable et sans le soutien de l'Imperium, ils mourront l'un après l'autre. Nous ponctuerons nos déclarations de citations issues de la Lex Imperialis et rappellerons que toute tentative de résistance ne fera qu'aggraver leur transgression. »

languages.text: 「まずこの惑星を包囲し、ヴォックス回線を乗っ取って、事実をはっきり放送する。囚人どもは、ほとんど住めもしない岩のために争っており、帝国当局の管理がなければ結局は死ぬ――その事実だ。帝国法典を引用して、抵抗は違反を重くするだけだと念押しする」
languages.original_text: "We lay our own siege to the planet, then seize its vox-frequencies and broadcast the plain truth: that the convicts are fighting for a barely habitable rock, and that without Imperium authorities in charge, they will die. We will drive the message home with quotations from the Lex Imperialis, declaring that any resistance only aggravates the transgression."

traits.locale_text: 「まずこの惑星を包囲し、ヴォックス回線を乗っ取って、事実をはっきり放送する。囚人どもは、ほとんど住めもしない岩のために争っており、帝国当局の管理がなければ結局は死ぬ――その事実だ。帝国法典を引用して、抵抗は違反を重くするだけだと念押しする。」
